body:
@jba that would make it a keyword conditional on its position, which would be a new concept in the language. At the very least, it would make people who write syntax highlighters grumpy.

I would also note that that @ianlancetaylor's [proposal](https://github.com/golang/go/issues/16339#issuecomment-235451601) for
```
var p.V
const p.C
type p.T
func p.F
```
is equivalent.
